sources.title: Weightless (moving father-son story in full length, new films German completely new 2024)

metadata.Plot: Joel (Alessandro Nivola) lives a solitary existence, rarely straying from his narrow routines of working in a landfill and going through the motions of getting through the day. He faces emotional and psychological upheaval with the arrival of Will, his ten-year-old son whom he has never met. The boy, who has been abandoned by his mother, weighs 250 pounds, is diabetic, and needs serious care -- attention Joel may not be capable of giving. Their collective pain, in the face of an indifferent world, could be crushing. Together, they embark on a journey of survival.
metadata.Writer: Jaron Albertin, Charlotte Colbert, Enda Walsh
metadata.Actors: Julianne Nicholson, Marc Menchaca, Alessandro Nivola
